Package sailpoint.workflow

Class RoleLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.workflow.ApprovalLibrary
      • sailpoint.workflow.RoleLibrary
  • public class RoleLibrary
extends ApprovalLibrary
    A workflow library with methods related to role model approvals.

    • Field Detail

      • VAR_APPROVAL_SOURCE

        public static final java.lang.String VAR_APPROVAL_SOURCE
        Workflow variable holding the name of the UI component that launched the workflow. This may be used to conditionalize workflow behavior.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VAR_IMPACT_ANALYSIS_OWNER

        public static final java.lang.String VAR_IMPACT_ANALYSIS_OWNER
        Workflow variable holding the name of the Identity that wishes to perform an impact analysis. In the standard workflow this will trigger an impact analysis, if not set we go directly to approvals.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VAR_IMPACT_ANALYSIS_FILTER

        public static final java.lang.String VAR_IMPACT_ANALYSIS_FILTER
        Filter used to to restrict what the impact analyzer looks at.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VAR_IMPACT_ANALYSIS_RESULT

        public static final java.lang.String VAR_IMPACT_ANALYSIS_RESULT

    • Method Detail

      • isSignificantChange

        public boolean isSignificantChange​(WorkflowContext wfc)
        Return true if the object being modified is considered to have significant changes. For roles this would be changes to the profile list or the profiles themselves but not things like the name or description.

      • launchImpactAnalysis

        public java.lang.Object launchImpactAnalysis​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                      throws GeneralException
        Start an impact analysis task for whatever is in the workflow. Currently this must be a role.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getRoleDifferences

        public java.lang.Object getRoleDifferences​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                    throws GeneralException
        Calculate the differences between the role held in the workflow and the current version.
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Returns:
        BundleDifference object
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • auditRoleDifferences

        public java.lang.Object auditRoleDifferences​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                      throws GeneralException
        Create multiple audit events, one for each attribute/diff in BundleDifferences
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Returns:
        null
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • buildOwnerApproval

        public Workflow.Approval buildOwnerApproval​(WorkflowContext wfc)
        Setup an Approval for the owner of a SailPointObject. Default owner is whatever is on the embedded object, it may also be passed in.

      • buildApplicationApprovals

        public java.util.List<Workflow.Approval> buildApplicationApprovals​(WorkflowContext wfc)
        For Role approvals only, build an Approval structure for the owners of each Application referenced in the role profiles. This is normally processed as a parallelPoll with the application owners submitting comments or modifying the role but not terminating the approval process.

      • enableRole

        public void enableRole​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                throws GeneralException
        Enables the role
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • disableRole

        public void disableRole​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                 throws GeneralException
        Disables the role
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • setRoleDisabledStatus

        public void setRoleDisabledStatus​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                           throws GeneralException
        Enables or disabled the role based on value of ARG_DISABLE
        Parameters:
        wfc - WorkflowContext
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • updateRolesDisabledFlag

        public void updateRolesDisabledFlag​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                             throws GeneralException
        Original 4.0 name kept for compatibility.

        GeneralException

      • removeOrphanedRoleRequests

        public void removeOrphanedRoleRequests​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                throws GeneralException
        Removes incomplete requests to activate/deactivate roles that no longer exists.
        Parameters:
        wfc - The current WorkflowContext object.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getApprovalAuditAction

        public java.lang.String getApprovalAuditAction​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                        throws GeneralException
        Called by the "action" Arg being passed to the audit() method when were auditing approvals.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getDisplayableRoleName

        public java.lang.String getDisplayableRoleName​(WorkflowContext wfc)
        If the object being approved is an instance of Bundle, use the displayable name, otherwise use the default getObjectName method.
        Parameters:
        wfc - The workflow context.
        Returns:
        The displayable name.

        Localize a message.

      • getStringList

        protected static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStringList​(java.lang.Object value)
        Coerce the given value into a list of strings. The value of the selections argument can be one of: - String - List Further, each String can be a CSV.
